history:
***history***
Monica: (neutral) Hey, Joey, could you pass the cheese?
Joey: (neutral) Listen uh, Id prefer it if you didnt call me Joey.
Based on the conversation ***history*** above, as Joey, please choose the most appropriate emotion among {surprise,anger,neutral,joy,sadness,fear,disgust} to respond to the Joey
SourceData: Since I dont know anyone here, I thought itd be cool to try out a cool work nickname.
Coct: What's wrong with calling you Joey? It's your name.
FSM: Im sorry, I just dont like it.
